name: FriendProject Advertisement Remover
description: Updates will be released as I work through each element that needs to be added in order to completely remove the advertisement sections. This script is currently stable. It hides all of the ads, but leaves "Upgrade to Remove Ads" where it should be. I'm working on fixing that.

user.name: unholymaster
user.about: I mostly create styles to remove ads on websites and dark themes for the websites that I visit the most due to Irlen Syndrome and sensitivity to bright colours. ________________________________________________________________________________ For my sets I use the following: Backgrounds - #000000/black Secondary backgrounds (sidebars) - #0a0a0a or #181717/dark grey Text - #444444/medium grey Links - #9043cc/dark purple Links hover - #be7fef/light purple ________________________________________________________________________________ Set: Dark Facebook (Deleted and only for my use) Dark userstyles Dark Stylish Chrome Editor Dark Spells of Magic Dark FriendProject (BETA)
